changes.description: Separate owner counts by character and corporation
Show multiple items in modal instead of dropdown
Add owner icon to asset items in tree view
Add badges for Industry and Structure items in assets views
Separate character and corporation owner icons
Use facility_id for job location instead of output_location_id
Cache unknown types to prevent repeated API calls
Queue resolution requests during active resolution
Trigger reference resolution from all stores
Memoize row components and reduce iterations
Centralize reference data resolution into single module
